item.title: UNCONSTITUTIONAL!: Federal Court Declares the Trudeau Regime's Use of the Emergencies Act Illegal [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ January 24, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew dig deep into the recent Federal Court's declaration that the Trudeau Regime's use of the Emergencies Act is UNREASONABLE, UNCONSTITUTIONAL, and, as far as we're concerned, ALL TOGETHER DIABOLICAL. The boys are also joined by Pastor Dr. Aaron Rock and LCC Chief-Litigator James S.M. Kitchen to get their perspectives on the decision and what Canadians ought to do in the wake of it.

[Segment 1] - EMERGENCIES ACT DECLARED UNCONSTITUTIONAL:
"Prime Minister Trudeau invokes Emergencies Act" | City News: https://www.youtube.com/embed/qITdkH8W_6M;
"Court ruling: Federal government acted illegally in responding to 2022 Freedom Convoy" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms: https://www.jccf.ca/court-ruling-federal-government-acted-illegally-in-responding-to-2022-freedom-convoy;
"Court Reasons" | PDF Document: https://www.jccf.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/2024-01-23-T-306-22-T-316-22-T-347-22-T-382-22-Reasons-FINAL.pdf;
"Federal Court declares Trudeau's Emergencies Act UNCONSTITUTIONAL" | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/01/23/federal-court-declares-trudeaus-emergencies-act-unconstitutional;

[Segment 2] - THE REGIME & STATE-FUNDED MEDIA RESPOND:
"Invoking Emergencies Act...Unreasonable, court rules" | CBC News: https://www.youtube.com/embed/gbqlcLXP4LM;
"'We don't agree' | Deputy Prime Minister Reacts..." | CTV News: https://www.youtube.com/embed/f_ScSzFWuRs;
"EMERGENCIES ACT | Public Safety Minister...defends invocation" | CTV News: https://www.youtube.com/embed/KY8PwLTGtYc;

[Segment 3] - Interviews ft. Dr. Aaron Rock & James S.M. Kitchens:
Interview with Dr. Rock: 44:40 - 1:09:55;
Interview with James S.M. Kitchen: 1:09:56 - 1:33:40;

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 01/23/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ January 23, 2023
On this first episode of our new Liberty Dispatch NEW BRIEF, hosts Andrew DeBartolo updates Canadians on the news they need to know, both here, at home, and around the globe. 

[Segment 1] - COVID Lockdown Charges STAYED Against Trinity Bible Chapel:
"Charges against Canadians who defended religious freedom stayed" | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms: https://www.jccf.ca/charges-against-canadians-who-defended-religious-freedom-stayed;
"Our latest fines & my last COVID blog (hopefully)" | Trinity Bible Chapel: https://trinitybiblechapel.ca/our-latest-fines-my-last-covid-blog-hopefully;

[Segment 2] - CULTIC WORSHIP to the NEW State Religion & Evangelical Compromise:

"Abortion killed 44.6 million people worldwide in 2023, more than any other cause of death" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/abortion-killed-44-6-million-people-worldwide-in-2023-more-than-any-other-cause-of-death;
"Trans-affirming toolkit tells teachers to put ideology above biology" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/opinion/jamie-sarkonak-trans-affirming-toolkit-tells-teachers-to-put-ideology-above-biology#Echobox=1705922455;
"TGC author: Straight men should consider singleness out of solidarity for celibate homosexuals" | Protestia: https://protestia.com/2021/10/24/tgc-author-straight-men-should-consider-singleness-out-of-solidarity-for-celibate-homosexuals;
"Straight Celibate Christian: TGCA interviews Simon Shead" | The Gospel Coalition Australia: https://au.thegospelcoalition.org/article/straight-celibate-christian-tgca-interviews-simon-shead;
The Christian Manifesto Interview w/Alistair Begg | YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/embed/rXDYYPLwgYE;

[Segment 3] - COVID FOREVER!:
"Excess deaths from heart disease" | Express: https://www.express.co.uk/life-style/health/1855412/heart-disease-excess-deaths;
"COVID-19 strain kills 100% of infected mice in Chinese lab study" | New York Post: https://nypost.com/2024/01/16/news/covid-19-strain-kills-100-of-infected-mice-in-chinese-lab-study;
"Feds admit to boasting an aggressive vaccine mandate during pandemic" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/feds_admit_to_boasting_an_aggressive_vaccine_mandate_during_pandemic;

item.title: CLEAN UP ON AISLE...NEWS: Canadian News You NEED to Know [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ January 18, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew bat clean up on Team News, bringing you all the news that you need to know to start 2024. 

[Segment 1] - RECENT NEWS:
"Canada-U.S. border preclearance" | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/canada-u-s-border-preclearance-1.7081019;
"Canadian police warn against posting surveillance footage of package thieves" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canadian-police-warn-against-posting-surveillance-footage-of-package-thieves-as-it-could-violate-criminals-privacy?utm_content=;
"Rebel News' David Menzies RCMP arrest" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/politics/rebel-news-david-menzies-rcmp-arrest;

item.title: Oh' Canada: COVID, Cults, and Chaos...Oh' MY! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ January 16, 2023
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew look at the current chaos in Canada; it's CRAZY!!!

[Segment 1] - COVID:
"Lawmakers: Anthony Fauci Admitted Six-Foot Social Distancing Was Based on Nothing" | Breitbart: https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2024/01/10/lawmakers-anthony-fauci-admitted-six-foot-social-distancing-was-based-on-nothing;
"Interior Health Drops COVID-19 Rapid Tests" | Global News: https://globalnews.ca/news/10214648/interior-health-drops-covid-19-rapid-tests;
"Study: Unvaccinated Barred from Public Venues" | Natural News: https://www.naturalnews.com/2023-12-29-study-unvaccinated-barred-public-venues-pfizer-adviser.html;
"Preprints | Impacts of Government Strategies for Controlling COVID-19: A Model-based Analysis" | OSF: https://osf.io/preprints/osf/mjc97;
"Seasonal Variation in Sudden Cardiac Death in Alberta, Canada" | PubMed: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/38198049;
"New Study Reveals mRNA COVID Boosters May Worsen Diabetes" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/health/new-study-reveals-mrna-covid-boosters-may-worsen-diabetes-5561389?rs=SHRNCMMW;
"‘Completely demoralizing’: B.C. men with COVID-19 vaccine injuries frustrated by compensation delays" | CTV News: https://bc.ctvnews.ca/completely-demoralizing-b-c-men-with-covid-19-vaccine-injuries-frustrated-by-compensation-delays-1.6714130;
"Canadian Pathologists Stumped by Explosive Growth in Deaths from Unknown Causes" | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/opinion/fournier-canadian-pathologists-stumped-by-explosive-growth-in-deaths-from-unknown-causes/51468;
"Lockdown Ideology Originated in 2006 Under George W. Bush" | Brownstone Institute: https://brownstone.org/articles/lockdown-ideology-originated-in-2006-under-george-w-bush/;

[Segment 2] - CULTS:
Australian Politician on the Climate Scan by Wide Awake Media | Twitter: https://twitter.com/wideawake_media/status/1746509042338484723;
"Venus was like Earth until climate change made it uninhabitable" | World Economic Forum: https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2020/12/venus-was-like-earth-until-climate-change-uninhabitable;
"Electric cars best vehicle in frigid temperatures, advocates say" | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/saskatoon/electric-cars-best-vehicle-frigid-temperatures-advocates-say-1.7082131;
"Ottawa Hospital Now Offering Genital Sex Change Surgeries" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/ottawa-hospital-now-offering-genital-sex-change-surgeries?utm_content=;
"WHO Appoints Canadian Trans Activist" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/09/who-appoints-canadian-trans-activist;

[Segment 3] - CHAOS:
"Close to 100 Canadian Churches Burned and/or Vandalized Since False Unmarked Grave Claim" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/close_to_100_canadian_churches_burned_and_or_vandalized_since_false_unmarked_grave_claim;

"Canada court OKs drug consumption site for Kamloops" | AP News: [https://apnews.com/article/canada-brit;
